target.rawSql:
-- TODO extract version, filter by environment, filter by service
SELECT
  timestamp as time,
  predicate, payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id' as title,
  array_to_string(
    ARRAY[
      'event:'|| subject || '.' || predicate,
      'environment:'|| (payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id'),
      'service:'|| (payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id')
    ], ','
  ) as tags,
  payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'artifactId' as text
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND subject = 'service' AND predicate IN ('deployed', 'upgraded', 'rolledback')
AND payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${environments:sqlstring}]::text[])
AND payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${services:sqlstring}]::text[])

-- TODO extract version, filter by environment, filter by service
select timestamp as time,
  payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id' as title,
  array_to_string(
    ARRAY[
      'event:'|| subject || '.' || predicate,
      'environment:'|| (payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id'),
      'service:'|| (payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'service' ->> 'id')
    ], ','
  ) as tags,
  -- payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id' as environment,
  -- payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'service' ->> 'id' as service,
  -- payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'artifactId' as artifact,
  payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'ticketURI' as text
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND subject = 'incident' AND predicate IN ('detected', 'reported')
AND payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${environments:sqlstring}]::text[])
AND payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'service' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${services:sqlstring}]::text[])

description: Demo for service annotations, a playground to send events

options.content:
# Playground & Demo

1. Use the forms to send event to the collector
2. The database is updated
3. The dashboard should reflect the event

This dashboard focus on **service** artifact (and **incident**) and show how to
compute some metrics and how to annotate (eg to enhance runtime metrics)

## Notes

- RAW form can be used to send any cdevent in json like in [cdevents'example](https://github.com/cdevents/spec/tree/spec-v0.4/conformance)
- You can edit and customize the dashboard to explore visualization of data
- The database is the same used in other dashboard
- The timeserie is a random, used to show annotation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT  count(*)::decimal * (1000*60*60*24*7) / (${__to} - ${__from}) as df
FROM  cdevents_lake
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND subject = 'service' AND predicate IN ('deployed', 'upgraded', 'rolledback')
AND payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${environments:sqlstring}]::text[])
AND payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${services:sqlstring}]::text[])

select count(DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id')
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND subject = 'incident' AND predicate IN ('detected', 'reported')
AND payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${environments:sqlstring}]::text[])
AND payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'service' ->> 'id' = ANY(ARRAY[${services:sqlstring}]::text[])

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id' as service
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE subject = 'service'
AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'service' ->> 'id' as service
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE subject = 'incident'
AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.label: Service Name
list.name: services
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' ->> 'id' as service
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE subject = 'service'
AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'service' ->> 'id' as service
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE subject = 'incident'
AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id' as environment
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE (subject = 'service' OR subject = 'incident')
AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
list.label: Environment
list.name: environments
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' -> 'environment' ->> 'id' as environment
FROM cdevents_lake
WHERE (subject = 'service' OR subject = 'incident')
AND  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
